db:abstract.db:para: This type was introduced in Qt 5.10.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: MenuBar consists of drop-down menus, and is normally located at the top edge of the window.

Typically, menus are statically declared as children of the menu bar, but MenuBar also provides API to add, insert, remove, and take menus dynamically. The menus in a menu bar can be accessed using menuAt().

db:member.db:link: Focus Management in Qt Quick Controls

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10)] contentHeight : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the content height. It is used for calculating the total implicit height of the menu bar.

db:note.db:para: This property is available in MenuBar since QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10), but it was promoted to the Container base type in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10).

db:section.db:title: [since QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10)] contentWidth : real
db:section.db:para: This property holds the content width. It is used for calculating the total implicit width of the menu bar.

db:note.db:para: This property is available in MenuBar since QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10), but it was promoted to the Container base type in QtQuick.Controls 2.5 (Qt 5.12).

db:section.db:para: This property was introduced in QtQuick.Controls 2.3 (Qt 5.10).

db:section.db:title: delegate : Component
db:section.db:para: This property holds the component that is used to create menu bar items to present menus in the menu bar.

db:section.db:title: menus : list<Menu>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the list of menus.

The list contains all menus that have been declared in QML as children of the menu bar, and also menus that have been dynamically added or inserted using the addMenu() and insertMenu() methods, respectively.

db:section.db:title: void addMenu(Menu menu)
db:section.db:para: Adds menu to the end of the list of menus.

db:section.db:title: Menu menuAt(int index)
db:section.db:para: Returns the menu at index, or null if it does not exist.

db:section.db:title: void removeMenu(Menu menu)
db:section.db:para: Removes and destroys the specified menu.

db:section.db:title: Menu takeMenu(int index)
db:section.db:para: Removes and returns the menu at index.

db:note.db:para: The ownership of the item is transferred to the caller.
